origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoMarketAPI.get_liquidity_report', 'description': 'This function provides a liquidity analysis report for a specified cryptocurrency over a given time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency for which the liquidity analysis is required.'}, {'name': 'duration', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which the liquidity analysis is required, e.g., 1_month, 3_months, 1_year.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The liquidity analysis report for the specified cryptocurrency over the given time period.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoMarketAPI.get_liquidity_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Balancer', 'duration'是'3_months'.
